sentences.en: His criticisms are clearly colored by animus.
The animus corresponds to the paternal Logos just as the anima corresponds to the maternal Eros.
sentences.cn: 阿尼姆斯相应于父性的逻各斯,正如阿尼玛相应于母性的厄洛斯.

sentences.en: When you have an animus against a person, you should give it up.
sentences.cn: 当你对别人怀有敌意时, 你应当放弃这种想法.

sentences.en: Your animus toward him suggests that you are the wrong man for the job.
sentences.cn: 你对他的敌意说明你不适合这份工作。

sentences.en: Your animus towards him suggests that you are the wrong man for the job.
sentences.cn: 你对他有看法表明你不是这份工作的合适人选。

words.tran_cn: 敌意；意图；基本态度；女性的男性意向

trans.tran_cn: <律>意图，仇恨，（女性人格的）男性意向，基本态度
trans.tran_en: a feeling of strong dislike or hatred
